title: Creamy Onion Soup
ingredients: ['6 onions, thinly sliced', '40g butter', '1 tablespoon plain flour', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '500ml chicken stock', '250ml milk', '125ml double cream', '3 egg yolks, beaten', '1 1/2 teaspoons paprika', 'ground black pepper to taste', '1/8 tablespoon red chilli sauce', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh parsley']
